Title: The great project to harness the Huai River
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A special inspection team from Beijing arriving in May 1951, with an inscription by Mao Zedong donated to the workers; a celebratory meeting; harvesting the first crop after the project has finished.
